initialQuests.title: Herbs for Narett
initialQuests.description: Alchemist Narett requires a batch of fresh herbs for a potent elixir he's crafting to bolster strength and vigor. He's asked you to gather the necessary ingredients with haste, as his potion is incomplete without them.

initialQuests.title: Sparkles
initialQuests.description: Traveler! Thank god you are here. I can't find my cat Sparkles anywhere. Could you help me look for her? It would mean the world to me.

initialQuests.title: The Blacksmith's Demand
initialQuests.description: Blacksmith Karvok has forged a new set of armor but lacks the strength to swing his hammer through the final adjustments. He calls upon you to bolster your arms in preparation to aid him in the final forge.
initialQuests.task: Do 20 push-ups to build strength for hammering.

initialQuests.title: Stamina of the Wolf
initialQuests.description: Hunter Alleria seeks companions who can match her endurance on her next expedition. Prove your stamina by simulating the swift strides of the wolf across challenging terrain.

initialQuests.title: Scrolls of the Elders
initialQuests.description: Scribe Elandor needs ancient scrolls from the high shelves of the library but cannot reach them. Assist him by stretching and reaching to the top shelves.
initialQuests.task: Stretch your arms above your head 10 times

initialQuests.title: Fruits of the Forest
initialQuests.description: Druid Faelara needs a bounty of fresh fruits for her forest rituals. She asks you to hone your agility by mimicking the picking of elusive fruits hidden in the treetops.
initialQuests.task: Do 10 lunges on each side to simulate fruit gathering.

initialQuests.title: Defensive Stance
initialQuests.description: Knight Ser Gavin is teaching recruits the proper defensive stance but needs an assistant to demonstrate. Practice your own balance to prepare.
initialQuests.task: Hold a plank position for 30 seconds.

initialQuests.title: The Call of the Falcon
initialQuests.description: Ranger Lira needs sharp eyes and strong focus for her falconry training. She has tasked you with preparing your vision and concentration.
initialQuests.task: Do a 5-minute breathing or meditation exercise.

initialQuests.title: March of the Stone Legion
initialQuests.description: Captain Thorek leads his troops on rigorous marches to prepare for battle. He challenges you to match their endurance and stamina in your own march.

initialQuests.title: Rations for the Road
initialQuests.description: Cook Yara requires aid gathering food and drink for the village. Prove your strength by lifting supplies that mimic carrying heavy provisions.
initialQuests.task: Do 20 bicep curls (using dumbbells or household items).

initialQuests.title: The Shaman's Ritual
initialQuests.description: Shaman Morgath is performing an earth-binding ritual, but it requires one to ground themselves firmly. Prepare by aligning your own strength to the earth.

initialQuests.title: Warden's Watch
initialQuests.description: Guard Captain Sera keeps her soldiers vigilant by testing their endurance during the long hours of watch. Join her in her nightly routine.
initialQuests.task: Hold a wall sit for 30 seconds.

initialQuests.title: Training for the Tournament
initialQuests.description: Jousting Master Lorian is looking for recruits to train for the upcoming tournament. Build your endurance and coordination to qualify for his prestigious training.

initialQuests.title: Blessings of the Light
initialQuests.description: Priestess Elda offers blessings to the brave but requires meditation to channel divine energy. Join her in focusing your mind and body to receive the light.
initialQuests.task: Do 5 minutes of guided meditation or mindfulness.

initialQuests.title: Miner's Bane
initialQuests.description: Miner Garik needs support in hauling the ore up from the mines. Mimic his grueling work to show your strength.
initialQuests.task: Do 10 deadlifts with a suitable weight or household object.

initialQuests.title: The Mage's Focus
initialQuests.description: Archmage Zorlan practices spells that require immense concentration. He asks you to prepare by improving your core strength, as a strong center keeps the mind balanced.
